about_the_game:
Breeding the perfect shrimp takes more than just luck;
The water must be perfect. The pedigree, pure.
Are you able to live the shrimple life, or will the demands of "normality" be your undoing?

  • Discover new and rare breeds through experimentation. Different breeds have different colors, but body patterns are also important!
  • Balance the water temperature and chemicals to optimize the environment
  • Manage multiple tanks to accomplish your breeding goals
  • Sell your shrimp to earn money, but be careful not to sell too many. Rare shrimp are expensive because they're rare!
  • Purchase tank upgrades (or supplements) to meet the requirements of different breeds
  • Find the hidden quirks of each breed to tip the scales in your favour

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Intel 5th Gen
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Additional Notes: This game might be able to be played on lower rated hardware, but performance and support is not guaranteed

name: Keeping It Shrimple

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel 4th Gen Dual Core 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida GTX Series 8
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: This game might be able to be played on lower rated hardware, but performance and support is not guaranteed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Keeping It Shrimple" is a management game where you breed, feed, and care for your adorable shrimp. Experiment with breeding pairs. Manage the water properties of your tanks. Sell rare breeds on the market. With planning, experimentation, and a dose of luck, you may just breed the perfect shrimp!
